author: gokturk
msg: * Fix to Randomly Failing Test: We have to get the current version from the MasterTable for modification tests, since we can't be sure if consecutively issued transactions will remain in commit queue.

author: kkolinko
msg: Update BZ 53047 proposal. Propose fix for BZ 53725.

author: kkolinko
msg: Thanks to the changes introduced by implementing BZ 53047, the roleNameCol and userRoleTable attributes in JDBCRealm and DataSourceRealm became optional ones.
